com.twofortyfouram.assertion

Class BundleAssertions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twofortyfouram.assertion.BundleAssertions

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class BundleAssertions
extends Object
    Runtime assertions for Bundle contents.

      • assertHasKey

        public static void assertHasKey(Bundle bundle,
                String requiredKey)
                         throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a mapping for requiredKey.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping for.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey.

                    String requiredKey)
                             throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a value of the correct type for requiredKey.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping to a boolean value.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey mapping to the correct type.

      • assertHasInt

        public static void assertHasInt(Bundle bundle,
                String requiredKey,
                int lowerBound,
                int upperBound)
                         throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a value of the correct type for requiredKey.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping to an int value.
        lowerBound - Inclusive lower bound for requiredKey's value. Must be <= upperBound.
        upperBound - Inclusive upper bound for requiredKey's value. Must be >= lowerBound.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey mapping to the correct type.

      • assertHasParcelable

        public static void assertHasParcelable(Bundle bundle,
                       String requiredKey,
                       Class<? extends Parcelable> expectedClass)
                                throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a value of the correct type for requiredKey.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping to a non-null Parcelable.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey mapping to the correct type.

      • assertHasString

        public static void assertHasString(Bundle bundle,
                   String requiredKey)
                            throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a value of the correct type for requiredKey.

        Note: Detection of incorrect type mapping only occurs on API level 12 or greater.

        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping to a String or null.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey mapping to the correct type.

      • assertHasString

        public static void assertHasString(Bundle bundle,
                   String requiredKey,
                   String... allowedValues)
                            throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a value of the correct type for requiredKey.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping to a String value.
        allowedValues - Set of allowed values for requiredKey's value. null indicates that all values are allowed.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey mapping to the correct type.

      • assertHasString

        public static void assertHasString(Bundle bundle,
                   String requiredKey,
                   boolean isNullAllowed,
                   boolean isEmptyStringAllowed)
                            throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains a value of the correct type for requiredKey.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check keys of.
        requiredKey - Key that bundle must have mapping to a String value.
        isNullAllowed - If null is allowed for the value.
        isEmptyStringAllowed - If the empty string is allowed for the value.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain requiredKey mapping to the correct type.

      • assertKeyCount

        public static void assertKeyCount(Bundle bundle,
                  int expectedCount)
                           throws AssertionError
        Asserts bundle contains exactly count keys.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle to check key count of.
        expectedCount - Expected count of keys in bundle. Must be >= 0.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If bundle doesn't contain expectedCount keys.

      • assertSerializable

        public static void assertSerializable(Bundle bundle)
        Asserts whether that a Bundle does not contain private Serializable classes.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to check.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if bundle contains a Serializable object that isn't part of the Android platform.
